title: Comparisons with the Logical And Operator
content: Sometimes you will need to test more than one thing at a time. The logical and operator(&&) returns true if and only if the operands to the left and right of it are true.
The same effect could be achieved by nesting an if statement inside other if.
This code will return 'Yes' if num is greater than 5 or less than 10. The same logic can be written with the logical and operator.

exercises.instruction: Replace the two if statements with one statement, using the && operator, which will return the string 'Yes' if val is less than or equal to 50 and greater than or equal to 25. Otherwise, will return the string 'No'

hint: You should use the && operator once
You should have one of statement
